content.question: A circuit is constructed with the battery, two resistors, switch, and inductor shown. The switch is initially open and then closed. Which of the following best indicates the current <math alttext="I sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="I sub f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> delivered by the battery immediately after the switch is closed and a long time after the switch is closed, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="I sub 0 equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ; <math alttext="I sub F equals 1.0 ampere" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1.0</mn><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 13.5: Circuits with Resistors and Inductors (LR Circuits)

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
